name: De Malle Muur
description:
De Malle Muur is a collection of mini games, the title is Dutch for "The Silly Wall". The goal of the game is to walk across a maze-like wall to the building on the right. Along the way you will be obstructed by psychopaths, represented by little dots. To pass each dot you need to complete a challenge. Pass the challenge and you may continue the game, fail and the game is over.

Each dot takes the player to a randomly selected mini-game, the games include:
  • De Verdoemde Dobbelaar (The Cursed Dice Player) three dice are cast, gues if the second throw will be higher or lower than the first.
  • De Pletter (The Squasher) guess the randomly selected letter to avoid being squashed
  • Maanlander (Moonlander), navigate your ship safely to the moon and avoid the meteors.
  • De Lopende Band (The Conveyor Belt), remember the order in which seven differently colored radios drop onto an conveyor belt.
  • Ufo-invasie (Ufo-invasion) stop the UFO's from invading the earth, move left and right and shoot a laser beam.
  • Dooie Pier (Grim Reaper) guess in which grave "Pier" is located using only three guesses
  • De Speelzieke Gorilla, guess the name of the gorilla which is quickly flashed at bottom of the screen.
  • Eenentwintigen (Black Jack), win in a game of black jack
  • De Boze Bommenlegger (The Angry Bomber) places a random bomb on the wall, essentially blocking the path
